statements: SELECT participant_id, participant_name, age, gender, contact_number FROM clinical_trial_participants
SELECT participant_name, gender, age, contact_number, participant_id FROM clinical_trial_participants
SELECT * FROM clinical_trial_participants
SELECT age, participant_id, gender, contact_number, participant_name FROM clinical_trial_participants
SELECT participant_name, age, gender FROM clinical_trial_participants
SELECT participant_id, participant_name, age, gender, contact_number FROM clinical_trial_participants WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY participant_name ASC
SELECT * FROM clinical_trial_participants WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT participant_name, age, gender FROM clinical_trial_participants WHERE gender = 'Female' AND age BETWEEN 20 AND 40
SELECT participant_id, age, contact_number FROM clinical_trial_participants WHERE participant_name LIKE 'J%'
SELECT COUNT(participant_id) AS total_participants, AVG(age) AS avg_age FROM clinical_trial_participants
SELECT * FROM participants WHERE age > 20;
SELECT participant_name, age FROM participants WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM medications WHERE frequency = 'Daily';
SELECT participant_name, condition FROM participants WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35;
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM medications WHERE participant_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM participants;
SELECT participant_name, age, gender FROM participants WHERE condition = 'Healthy' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT participant_name, condition, medication_name, dosage FROM participants p JOIN medications m ON p.participant_id = m.participant_id WHERE age > 30;
SELECT participant_name, gender, medication_name, frequency FROM participants p JOIN medications m ON p.participant_id = m.participant_id WHERE gender IN ('Male', 'Female') ORDER BY participant_name;
SELECT * FROM medications WHERE medication_name LIKE 'Aspirin%' OR frequency = 'Twice a day';
SELECT * FROM participants LIMIT 10;
SELECT name, age FROM participants WHERE age > 30;
SELECT med_name, dosage FROM medications ORDER BY med_name DESC;
SELECT site_location FROM trial_sites WHERE site_name = 'Site A';
SELECT participant_id, gender FROM participants WHERE gender ='Male';
SELECT * FROM participants WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, gender FROM participants WHERE gender = 'Male' AND age BETWEEN 25 AND 40;
SELECT site_name, site_location FROM trial_sites WHERE site_location LIKE '%California%';
SELECT med_name, dosage, frequency FROM medications ORDER BY dosage DESC;
SELECT * FROM participants JOIN trial_sites ON participants.participant_id = trial_sites.site_id;
SELECT * FROM Participants;
SELECT participant_id, first_name, last_name FROM Participants ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT trial_id, trial_name, drug_name FROM Trials WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT participant_id, trial_id, visit_date FROM Visits ORDER BY visit_date DESC;
SELECT participant_id, test_name, result FROM TestResults WHERE result = 'positive';
SELECT * FROM Participants
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM Participants
SELECT participant_id, first_name, age FROM Participants WHERE age > 30
SELECT * FROM Trials WHERE start_date <= '2022-01-01'
SELECT participant_id, test_name, result FROM TestResults JOIN Participants ON TestResults.participant_id = Participants.participant_id
SELECT * FROM participants;
SELECT participant_id, first_name, last_name, age FROM participants WHERE age > 30;
SELECT medication_name, effectiveness_score, side_effects FROM medications ORDER BY effectiveness_score DESC;
SELECT appointment_date, appointment_type, completed FROM appointments WHERE completed = TRUE;
SELECT site_name, location, lead_researcher FROM study_sites WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM participants WHERE age > 30;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM participants WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT participant_id, first_name, last_name, age FROM participants ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM medications WHERE effectiveness_score > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE completed = FALSE ORDER BY appointment_date ASC;
